entry.card_html: Organization and support for the many details of life as a prostate cancer survivor
entry.name: care_plan

entry.card_html: Explore your values, your preferences, and the current medical knowledge to help you discuss your treatment options with your doctors.
entry.name: decision_support_p3p

entry.description: P3P [strategy_1: <a nested combined strategy>: (user is PATIENT) AND (user NOT IN (sexual_recovery, care_plan, community_of_wellness)] AND [strategy_2 <a nested combined strategy>: ((user NOT IN wisercare clinic) OR (user IN both p3p and wisercare))] AND [strategy_3: (user has NOT started TX)] AND [strategy_4: (user has PCaLocalized)]

kwargs.name: strategy_1
kwargs.description: User is patient and not in list of interventions

kwargs.name: strategy_2
kwargs.description: User not in WC or (both p3p and WC)

entry.name: P3P Access Conditions

entry.card_html: WiserCare helps patients and providers make smarter, more confident treatment choices
entry.name: decision_support_wisercare

entry.description: Wisercare [strategy_1: <a nested combined strategy>: (user is PATIENT) AND (user NOT IN (sexual_recovery, care_plan, community_of_wellness)] AND [strategy_2: <a nested combined strategy>: ((user NOT IN p3p clinics) AND (user IN WiserCare clinic)] AND [strategy_3: (user has NOT started TX)] AND [strategy_4: (user has PCaLocalized)]
entry.name: Wisercare Access Conditions
exclusive decision support strategy when real DS aren't avail

entry.card_html: Compare your symptoms over time with men like you, and manage symptoms that bother you.
entry.name: self_management

entry.description: Confirm user is patient who hasn't been given access to Sexual Recovery
entry.name: Allow Self Management if patient not in Sexual Recovery

entry.card_html: Learn strategies for developing a new normal in your sex life after treatment for prostate cancer.
entry.name: sexual_recovery

entry.card_html: TrueNTH Decision Support is intended for use by men who have been diagnosed with localized prostate cancer (the cancer is not in other parts of the body), but who have not yet started active treatment.
entry.name: decision_support_unavailable

entry.card_html: TrueNTH brings lived experiences from men, their caregivers and clinicians to help you in your prostate cancer journey.
entry.name: lived_experience

entry.card_html: To provide men and the people in their lives with the tools and support they need to optimize their health through exercise and diet.
entry.comment: Exercise and Diet (non-RCT). See also Community of Wellness
entry.name: exercise_diet

entry.description: Confirm user hasn't been given access to Community of Wellness or Sexual Recovery
entry.name: Allow Exercise & Diet if not in Communitiy of Wellness or Sexual Recovery

entry.custom_text: Tools for navigating the prostate cancer journey
entry.name: landing sub-title

## SITE-PERSISTENCE Managed: File managed with site_persistence - don't edit.
DEFAULT_LOCALE = 'en_US'
NO_CHALLENGE_WO_DATA = True  # Grandfather in users missing data
PATIENT_LIST_ADDL_FIELDS = ['reports']
PORTAL_STYLESHEET = '/static/css/portal.css'
GIL = True
SHOW_WELCOME = True
SHOW_PROFILE_MACROS = ['race', 'ethnicity', 'consent', 'clinical_questions', 'intervention_reports', 'procedures', 'gender', 'interventions']
USER_FORGOT_PASSWORD_EMAIL_TEMPLATE = 'flask_user/emails/truenth_forgot_password'
CONSENT_EDIT_PERMISSIBLE_ROLES=['patient', 'admin']
CONSENT_WITH_TOP_LEVEL_ORG=True
REQUIRED_CORE_DATA=['name', 'dob', 'role', 'org', 'clinical', 'localized', 'race', 'ethnicity', 'indigenous', 'privacy_policy', 'website_terms_of_use']

   {'code': '26294005', 'display': 'Radical prostatectomy (nerve-sparing)'},
